alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 13 at 4:00AM HST until November 13 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND KAUAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI... .A northwest swell (320 degrees) will build this morning and generate low-end advisory level surf along north and west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai and along north facing shores of Oahu, Molokai, and Maui through this afternoon. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf 10 to 15 feet along north facing shores and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai. North facing shores of Oahu, Molokai, and Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
